00001 #ifndef COULFUNC_H
00002 #define COULFUNC_H
00003 
00004 #include <coul/cwfcomp.H>
00005 #include "Constants.h"
00006 #include "PPair.h"
00007 
00008 class CoulFunc;
00009 
00010 extern double gsl_PEshift_function_dE(CoulFunc*,int,double,double);
00011 
00012 struct CoulWaves {
00013   double F;
00014   double dF;
00015   double G;
00016   double dG;
00017 };
00018 
00019 class CoulFunc {
00020   public:
00021     CoulFunc(PPair *a) {
00022       z1_=a->GetZ(1);
00023       z2_=a->GetZ(2);
00024       redmass_=(double)a->GetRedMass();
00025       lLast_=0;
00026       radiusLast_=0.0;
00027       energyLast_=0.0;
00028       coulLast_.F=0.0;
00029       coulLast_.dF=0.0;
00030       coulLast_.G=0.0;
00031       coulLast_.dG=0.0;
00032     };
00033     int z1() const {
00034       return z1_;
00035     };
00036     int z2() const {
00037       return z2_;
00038     };
00039     double redmass() const {
00040       return redmass_;
00041     };
00042     int lLast() const {
00043       return lLast_;
00044     };
00045     double radiusLast() const {
00046       return radiusLast_;
00047     };
00048     double energyLast() const {
00049       return energyLast_;
00050     };
00051     struct CoulWaves coulLast() const {
00052       return coulLast_;
00053     };
00054     void setLast(int a, double b, double c, CoulWaves d) {
00055       lLast_=a;
00056       radiusLast_=b;
00057       energyLast_=c;
00058       coulLast_.F=d.F;
00059       coulLast_.dF=d.dF;
00060       coulLast_.G=d.G;
00061       coulLast_.dG=d.dG;
00062     };
00063     struct CoulWaves operator()(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00064       struct CoulWaves result={0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0};
00065       if(l==lLast()&&radius==radiusLast()&&energy==energyLast()) {
00066         result=coulLast();
00067       } else {
00068         std::complex<double> eta(sqrt(uconv/2.)*fstruc*z1()*z2()*
00069                                  sqrt(redmass()/energy),0.);
00070         std::complex<double> rho(sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*
00071                                  sqrt(redmass()*energy),0.);
00072         std::complex<double> lValue( (double) l, 0.);
00073         Coulomb_wave_functions coul(true,lValue,eta);
00074         std::complex<double> c_F, c_dF, c_G, c_dG;
00075         coul.F_dF(rho,c_F,c_dF);
00076         coul.G_dG(rho,c_G,c_dG);
00077         struct CoulWaves newResult={real(c_F),real(c_dF),real(c_G),real(c_dG)};
00078         setLast(l,radius,energy,newResult);
00079         result=newResult;
00080       }
00081       return result;
00082     };
00083     double Penetrability(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00084       struct CoulWaves coul=this->operator()(l,radius,energy);
00085       double rho=sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*sqrt(redmass()*energy);
00086       return rho/(pow(coul.F,2.0)+pow(coul.G,2.0));
00087     };
00088     double PEShift(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00089       struct CoulWaves coul=this->operator()(l,radius,energy);
00090       double rho=sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*sqrt(redmass()*energy);
00091       return rho/(pow(coul.F,2.0)+pow(coul.G,2.0))*
00092         (coul.F*coul.dF+coul.G*coul.dG);
00093     };
00094     double PEShift_dE(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00095       return gsl_PEshift_function_dE(this,l,radius,energy);
00096     };
00097   private:
00098     int z1_;
00099     int z2_;
00100     int lLast_;
00101     double redmass_;
00102     double radiusLast_;
00103     double energyLast_;
00104     struct CoulWaves coulLast_;
00105 };
00106
